content.detailedDescription:
On january 10, 2015 between 8:45pm and 9:00 pm, sharpsburg, ga... observed 11 large bright lights travel (from horizon to horizon) east to west in a straight line of travel. night sky was relatively clear. there was no noise from the lights. objects appeared to be in low earth orbit. 

1. first was two lights traveling abreast of one another. followed these lights until i could no longer see them on the horizon.

2. before i lost sight of the first two lights another two lights appeared from the east. this time the lights were again traveling abreast of one another but the more southerly light was trailing the northerly light slightly but seemed to be moving slightly faster than the northerly light. by the time the lights were directly overhead the southerly light had moved even with the northerly light and gradually seemed to move ahead of the northerly light.

3. the subsequent seven lights were single observations that followed tracked along the same east/west path with approximately the same duration between objects (just about the time i would lose sight of the westerly object another would appear from the east).

please note:
myself and one other person witnessed this event.

i first tried to explain it away as the space station must be separating from a shuttle capsule (but the direction seemed wrong), then the other lights started appearing and my explanation fell apart quickly. 

i am sixty two years old, i grew up about 7 miles from johnson space center in houston, tx. i have been following the space program all of my life. i have seen hundreds upon hundreds of satellites in the night skies. i have seen the space shuttle separate from the space station in the early evening sky. 

before today, i have never been compelled to report an event such as this to anyone. i'm sure there could be a explanation, but i know not what that explanation is at this time.
content.summary: Over 15 minute period observed 11 significant bright lights traveling east to west pass directly overhead.

content.detailedDescription: Saw a extremly large  red planet type sphere in sky aprox.10 seconds.I wanted to get better look because some trees were in front of it but not at all blocking it.It was at a low horizon.I was on a bicycle so i put my head down to pedal the bike.When i looked up it was gone.I called the hamlet north carolina police dept.They said another person called to report it.I was at my mothers house.The reason i noticed it was it was extremly large.Did not affect me any way except that i want to know what it was.Please contact me because i would like to talk about it.
content.summary: Looked like a giant planet orange in color

content.detailedDescription:
Hi i would like to start with it all happend around 2012 olympics i have seen ufo alone one after another andd around 15 flying together i have so many sighting that i dont know where tp start i have shown all my friends when i spot one to the point we're they beleive but the main one ii want to report i was stood outside with a cigarette with my girlfriend as usual when a huge ufo went past so big i was petrified it was so close i normaly run inside but it has me motionless i was so scared i thpught they wanted me it was so silent i couldnt belive it it before this i had seen 50+ always the same direction anyway it felt like it wanted to be seen this happehappend again 2 times bit not as close i haave so many i dont know wehre to start and this is wehre you might belive me since the olympics 2 years ago i have seen less then 10 ufo i would be happey to reports the. others but im on mmy phone and its hard to type 

one more thing everytime it was silent bright white light i fealt i weird sort of scared
the date and times i entered are wrong as it happend so many times
content.summary: Seen so many the closest one was the scariest all started around 2012 london olympics

content.detailedDescription:
On dec 21st 2012 around 1 am i witnessed what i call a halo moon. essentially what this looks like is a huge circle almost like a large lens in from of the moon. it's a very curious sight and occurs typically on full moons at or around 1 a.M.

that same year before this event i had a ufo encounter while flying with father to virginia. ever since i've been focused on the sky to find proof of the e.T. phenomena. 

on oct 9th 2014 after looking at the night sky for many years i noticed the same halo moon. at 1 a.M. but this time i had my phone and took a picture. within the halo i noticed an object that i could not see with my eye's within the halo. the object was in orbit around the moon and threw my phones star walk app i made sure to determine during these times the celestial traffic so this would not be debunked. i also took multiple pictures from various angles to ensure this photo was not a reflection of moon light on my camera lens.

i also for the first event woke my wife up at 1 a.M. to show her the object. it was invisible to the human eye but visible threw the camera which had a large range of visible spectrum allowing the hidden object to be visible to it. this object around the moon was by my estimation 30 miles long. it was an enormous size. having confirmed that the halo around the moon was somehow linked with this object i came to look for it every night.

jan 5th 2015 at 1 a.M. i witnessed the third halo moon and as soon as i saw it i rushed to get my camera to affirm the object previously witnessed was linked to this event. to my great surprise the object was exactly as it was before. as before it changed colors within the camera from silvery white to blue. it is clearly a solid object that is attempting to obscure itself from view. yet while this object didn't want to be seen by the general public it threw telepathic connection wanted me to be aware of it. i had from the sighting with my father and knowing beings of other worlds are real had allot of anger feeling different from other people knowing a profound truth amidst of world of people who are for the most part ignorant to it. the message sent essentially was they want to help and are here for those of the world who will positively interact with them. threw this telepathic link a great deal more information was provided this information gives a history of our planet which has been for sometime unknown and misunderstood. 

you may witness this event to discover the truth of my statements and also witness a ufo. this ufo you will witness is large 30 miles long at minimum. it can be seen best during a full moon at 1 a.M. during what i call a halo moon. at this time you will witness what seems to be a large lens in front of the moon. if you then take your iphone and turn the camera towards the moon threw that lens you will see an object you can't see with your eyes. at the time of the last sighting the i used my star walk 2 app to affirm the locations of planets and satellites to ensure this would not be debunked as jupiter. also these objects are easily visible to the naked eye while this object is not. only threw a lens which allows a large field of light to be seen can you witness the object. the ufo is essentially from my telepathic understanding cloaked to avoid being seen. yet they wanted to be seen by the people who are paying attention or looking for the right reasons. this object is solid although it is cloaked and it is massive!!! i advise your ufo teams to try this out and see a 30 mile long ufo for yourselves to prove this to the world.

happy stargazing!!! 

photo 1 shown is from oct 9th which i can prove the dates of them being captured. the halo isn't visible due to the darkness and the light of the moon but the ufo within it is.

photo 2 essentially shows the same object on jan 5th taken with the same camera under the exact same light conditions.

remember this ufo is in orbit around the moon. also this light is invisible to the naked eye only via the camera does it show. it will also change colors when you view it. yet to be seen from earth so clearly means the object is insanely large. clearly not made on earth.
content.summary: Halo moon ufo

content.detailedDescription: Driving in slowing to halted traffic. my mom said look.  my thought was this must be the largest derris wheel in the world,  how is it that i have not hear tale of this eighth wonder of the world.  it went from horizontal to vertical in seconds, then came directly above my vehicle. totally in aww, completely amazed and totally shocked. then overjoyed and connected, feeling the power of it as one with my being. after observing all details , i looked into the windows and made eye contact with its occupancy. the craft ascended so fast it became a small dot in seconds then vanished.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Mind blowing, shocking, awsome.

content.detailedDescription: my mother and i drove up to a house driveway to see it looking for a rental home.   she stayed in car while i checked the home out from the front .    she suddenely called my name, i turned around to see her looking at the sky.  i saw several spheres grouped together, as if they were basketballs about 1000 feet up.  except these spheres quickly disbursed in all directions.     i kept my eyes trained on two of them, that also disbursed apart one heading north and one heading west.   they flew under a type of intelligent control.   changing their flight path and speed at times.    very fast.   the whole viewing lasted 30 seconds.   they were objects that seemed to be ejected from something all at once, and then flew in all different directions apart from each other
content.summary: Approx 50 spheres were grouped together then dispersed apart

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work, when i noticed an odd stationary object in the sky over a schoolyard clearing. living within a few miles of love field, i am accustomed to seeing aircraft both ascend and descend, day and night. this was different. when i first noticed it, i assumed it was a military plane, but upon further observation, noticed it was stationary. within the 1-2 minutes i was able to stare during a red light, the aircraft did not move. when the light turned green i went forward, towards it, and it began to hastily move north/northeast. i followed the best i could through neighborhood streets to track it's rapid movement but i was unsuccessful. i was able to see it twice more before it disappeared. shortly after, a seperate, oddly floaty seeming aircraft was visible, further northeast. they were soundless. i've never experienced anything like this.
content.summary: I live by an airport. i see landings regularly. this behaved unlike anything i've seen.

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed on photos only/if these photos are of interest i have at least 15 more picture one with 2 orbs on the highway approximately 2 feet apart from each other.
 i am asking if these are just refractive light off the camera from the sun?
however there are multiple pictures off of a i phone 4 and a i phone 5.
nice to be able to post pics.
thank you
there is one other pic that is really strange however there was no more space to post pic.
let me know if you want to see it.
content.summary: Only on pictures with a i phone 4 and i phone 5/possibly sun affected pic?

content.detailedDescription: Filmed through windows you can see orb my phone messed up recording. then u see it something changing the clouds . i have a different video of clouds changing into different shapes then back to original shape after it appears to "eat" another cloud
content.summary: Seen orb like think then thing changes clouds

content.detailedDescription: i was at home, i called a friend and had just stepped outside for a smoke, when i noticed a orb moving north, i hung up pulled out my phone and started taking pictures. i was so focused on the one that i failed to notice the other two following behind the first in a line formation. when they got a little bit closer to overhead of my house they formed a almost triangular formation and started to ascend. as they were doing this they started to dim and become almost opaque one headed e, another w and the third just kept ascending almost looked like it started to head west as i lost visual. called my friend back and 2 followed the same path, again hung up took video and picture both headed east after ascending. called my friend yet again and 2 more showed up, as they were almost directly over my house my mother came home i asked her what they were and she couldn't tell either. as i was filling this out my mother spotted yet another one. total count is 8 as of right now. i will be going outside to watch for more. i have more photos and video upon request. i knew these were not airplanes or helicopters on first sight as they sky around my house is rather lousy with them. during the sightings i was just in complete awe, there was only calm thoughts in my mind, it was rather beautiful.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 7 orbs moving n then hovering ascending and heading mostly w / nw

content.detailedDescription:
The frankfort cessna saucer incident
i had my first sighting back in 1982. at age 12 in frankfort, new york
now i'm 45, and interviewed many people on this subject. i've had several encounters with flying disk craft.
i'll give you the short version.  it was the summer of 1982 when i was in the car with my mom and aunt. a very clear blue sky day. we noticed a shiny, flashing disk in the sky.  it dove at the nose of a cessna airplane that was flying from east to west. the plane dove down then up trying to elude the flying disk in the sky. the saucer did the classic right angle turning associated with classic flying saucers.  it moved back and forth at high speed like a silver shinning giant dragon fly except more precisely.  the craft taunted the occupants in the plane.  we thought there was going to be a mid air collision.  this craft flew right up to the windshield of the plane.  again and again. it flew so close it was right at its nose by just perhaps even as close a  6 feet. it flew with such agility as to make the airplane look very modelish compared to a ferrari.  i knew then that people were telling the truth flying saucers did exist i told myself as i watched out the back window headed east towards the town of herkimer new york. my mom and aunt were too afraid to pull off to the side of the road to further observe the possible deadly air collision that i was sure was going to happen. i assume it never did. or did it?  the saucer was about twice the size as the little cessna.  there began my life long study of ufo government and aliens.  it took me many years to learn about what i had just witnessed. i now believe the craft was not alien.  but an alien reproduction vehicle.  i know a lot about flying saucers. as much as anyone not building them i suppose.  i wondered for many years of what the flashing of the saucer was for.  i know believe it was from high voltage discharge units produced by trigatrons combined with helium gas.  moving through what tesla called ether space.  produced by ac dc blocking. i have always wanted to find the people in the cessna. i need help from a mufon investigator. i will send you my other accounts soon . much better than this one.  where physical evidence was left behind.
content.summary: In 1982 when i was 12 years old saw a shiney, flashing disk in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing by my house door at about 7am january 10 2015 when this bright object with a partial shape-shifting halo got my attention ,i first thought it was the moon coming over the roof of the house. this bright object was almost straight overhead moving from sw to ne with no sound , the halo around the object was changing shape, brighter,larger,spiraling.There were three more smaller bright objects spaced behind the bright object without  halos, stretching across a quarter of the sky from first to last object,as these were moving, the sky (relative to objects) looked as if it was being pulled along by these objects.They all disappeared into the dawn's light. this all took place in about 90 seconds, 
  i believe this was an asteroid with it's halo and debris field illuminated by the rising sun. this was an awesome sight, would like to rewind it and watch again. i believe it was many many miles high , but still a near miss if it was an asteroid!!
content.summary: Large bright object with shape shifting, partial halo, with three smaller bright objects following behind. once in lifetime sight!          behind

content.detailedDescription: This picture was taken during a bus tour of belfast, northern ireland. this object was not observed at the time and only after we reviewed our vacation photos, did we notice the object. i have no idea what is depicted, maybe a bug? i zoomed in on the object and it appears to be something flying in the sky. it does not appear to be a bird or a plane.
content.summary: Object appears in picture, not observed when picture was taken

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Standing in corn field i looked up seen a white orb coming at us from the west about 500-800 ft went over are heads heading to the east right before sunrise
content.summary: We were in a corn field i want to keep name of road secret because of resent bigfoot siting last week

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?

i was leaving price right i looked up and saw the bright light and watched for 5 minutes to assure it's not a helicopter. i got home 5 minutes away then saw another craft after 5 more minutes and tried to film with my phone. my phone died so i came inside and filed this report my phone came back on with 20% power. strangers walking while i was filming didn't know what it was either.



2. what made you first notice the object?

i noticed it cause i always look.



3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

i thought it was a ufo



4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.

one hovered the other flew slow



5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

i felt normal i see ufo's



5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

i lost sight cause i came in out the cold to charge my phone that fake died on me
content.summary: 2 white twinkling lights in the sky one moving the other hovered

content.detailedDescription: There were red/orange colored lights above my apartment last month. they made no noise. 3 of them were in a triangular shape and the others were not in a particular shape. they moved from the right to left (west to east) and then disappeared.
content.summary: Lights in the sky that moved from west to east then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
First of all i'm a ufo believer. i believe in other intelligent life form in this vast universe and i'm sure some of them cross our space/path. also the reason i don't remember all the details about this story is i was startled at first, then secondly in the back of my head i convinced myself that what i saw was a spotlight from a nearby city. which was later proved to me it wasn't when i thought about it more clearly that there are no spotlights that strong so that it can "follow" us for that long. since then i just let this go but its still in the back of my mind what i saw (and my cousin who was terrified and just wanted to go home) and i want to know more. 

i'm only writing about this since i thought i might get some help from above top secret or mufon to see if anyone else have seen/heard of similar sighting anywhere else in the world, or even sweden where me and my girl cousin saw this. 

i've posted from where we both first spotted it to where we stopped looking for this thing (using maps app on my macintosh) 

first off we were driving home after being to the movies... it was sometime around 11 pm i recall. and i thought i saw something in the sky but then dismissed it as being light reflection in my own _.. then a few minutes later i see the same thing and this time i see a big light above the clouds... and it has 3-4 lights spinning around the bigger light. and it was moving back and forth (like a spot light) across the sky. then would disappear shortly and come back. 

my cousin was just as shocked as she also told me she dismissed it first as reflection on the car windshield. she was actually pretty startled and kind of scared. we both tried to film this on our iphones but you couldn't manage to see anything because of the darkness and it was just above the clouds so you couldn't see it in the movie. 

at first later i heard about our monthly open night club being open that night so i thought they had a spotlight on or something...And that it was what we saw, so i dismissed the whole thing. then a few days later i actually thought of the whole distance i drove while seeing this thing and it possibly couldn't have been a spotlight anyhow. 

anyway. have you guys heard of such a ufo, especially around that time of year maybe in sweden or elsewhere in the world at that time, a ufo with round lights spinning around its "bottom" ? 

(where the purple pin is dropped is where we spotted the light and where the yellow road ends is where we stopped looking at it and lost it basically)
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Me and my cousin first thought we both saw a big light reflection in the windshield when later we both observed a big light going from ne to nw then hovering - orb looking with smaller orb spinning around it.

content.detailedDescription:
I(karen) and bonnie were driving westbound on tuscarawas road about 3:30 pm. we saw 3 objects in the sky. i pulled over and took a photo, ceased observation and we continued on our way. my photo will be uploaded as photo file 1. my husband told me that a friend of his also posted a photo of the event which he downloaded from facebook. it will be uploaded as photo file 2. the exif data on either photo may not be accurate but the creation date of file 2 is accurate and is sept. 12, 2013. my husband was viewing the internet yesterday and saw your case files 44022 and 44028. photo file 3 is what one of those witnesses took on nov. 15, 2012. i submitted this report in an attempt to verify the other reports and that objects were seen. my husband's friend's photo may solve the cases.
that photo is crisp and clear. i will mention once again that the date of my sighting is unclear but approximate.
content.summary: 3 slowly ascending objects

content.detailedDescription: At around 7:00pm, i was returning to st. louis from effingham, il, driving southbound on 255.  i glanced down to check my speed and when i looked up i saw an extremely large multiple story object hovering near the highway in the distance.  i saw flashing lights that seemed to create a rotation-like pattern and what appeared to be small windows. the object appeared to be metallic.  i couldn't understand how an object so incredibly large could just hang in the sky like that.  once i processed what i was seeing, i immediately opened my car's window as i continued to drive to see if i could hear the object, but heard nothing other than the highway noise.  i very specifically recall noticing that all of the hair on my arms was standing on end (i had removed my coat in the car for the long drive home).  when i payed attention to the road, i noticed other cars on the road swerving and slowing down, so for safety's sake, i attempted to get off at the next exit ramp so i could get a better look at the object.  after a few seconds of focusing on the road and before i was able to successfully get off the highway, i glanced up and saw that the object was gone.
content.summary: Large multiple story object hovering near highway

content.detailedDescription:
I was a teenager, still living with my parents. we were all awakened by a loud, eerie sound. i screamed and ran to my parents' bedroom, where the dogs were howling and had jumped into my parents' bed as well. my dad sent me and my mother back to my room and he went outside to investigate. he didn't come back for awhile.
he reported being pulled up into a disc type craft which was hovering over our house. this craft then went to a cigar shaped craft. he said the beings were similar to humans, but were golden and without distinct features. they were hot to the touch. they questioned him and reported that they were keeping an eye on the earth because of the danger of a nuclear war which would affect the entire universe. my dad was told to report this to the government, which he did.
three uniformed gentlemen came to our house a while later. air force, i believe. they met with my dad in his office, so i wasn't actually in the room, but he reported to my mom and me that he was told that the armed forces and government knew about the alien aircraft and beings, but were keeping it secret so as not to alarm the general public.
"they", the beings, were with us for awhile...Or at least we could see the effects of their being there. doors would not open that did not have locks. doors would close. they told my dad they had the ability to be invisible to human eyes. my dad never reported it to anyone other than the government because of the harassment those who did report such things received. there were a lot of sightings in the early sixties in michigan. horrible things happened to the folks' homes, property, etc.  i hated living with the secret. hated the things that were going on as i didn't want to be weird. i have no doubts about what happened. i will never forget that noise. my dad even checked with the local officials to see if anyone had reported a sonic boom or anything on the night of the event...Just to see if there were others who had heard it...Nothing had been reported.  my mother is still living, although she doesn't remember a lot about it, but she does remember that it happened and that our lives were not our own for several months.
content.summary: Craft hovered over our house and took my dad aboard for a period of time.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend took a late drive out to cape arago state park,5 miles past charelston ,ore.We went out made the loop and stopped at a place on the way back called sea lion lookout.It was about 11:45 on sat.The 10th 2015.I was taking some long exposure shots of the stars with my canon powershot sx170is.Just before we left i took another shot,just above the tree line facing east(approx) i had my camera set to auto,15 sec exposure,with a 2 sec. timer.Was not touching camera.And was in almost complete darkness.It was about 30 sec. later driving back did i see the object in the photo.Thought it was maybe just some line in the photo until i brought it up on my computer.Then i was able to zoom in and see that it was something,what, i don't know.
content.summary: Was out at the beach with a friend.I took a 15 exposure of the sky and stars,just above the tree line facing east.I caught what seams to be a craft coming into the frame when i zoomed in ,it looked like a ball indside a ring and the ring was square.

content.detailedDescription:
It was night time in taiwan,my family and i were staying on top of a hill as tourists. as i was playing around with my camera, zooming in into the night sky,i happen to see 3 lights that kept changing colours from red to green or blue, and zooms in different random directions after approximately a 2 seconds interval.
i do not know the distance as i could not see it with my naked eyes nor with any decreased level of zoom, only with  the maximum zoom of the camera i could see the lights(ufo).
it was at night and i was really excited and thrilled to see it, i took pictures and a video,however my dad deleted it explaining that it was probably just a fly in the high altitudes. 
even though i do not have evidence i swear im telling the truth about my encounter. it was 3 years ago though, but i hope it serves its purpose to help relate to other incidents perhaps.It captured my attention as it was a dark night and the lights were very bright.
i "lost track" of it when i was asked to go back to my hotel.
content.summary: Lights that kept changing from red->green->blue and zoomed in random straight l

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my home and had gone to the rear of the property to let my dog out into my yard for his final toilet trip before retiring for the evening.Where i live has little light pollution and i often look up at the night sky as we have some fantastic clear evenings. as i opened my yard door which faces due south i immediately noticed a pulsating object in the night sky where there is normally not any aircraft or stars. it was high enough to be an aircraft but too low to be a star and at first i though it might be a helicopter. earlier that evening, approximately 3.5 hours, i heard a helicopter and saw a green light from the helicopter a few hundred feet up to my east. 

i am a surfer and very familiar with the layout of my local coastline and the flightpath both commercial, private and military aircraft take. this light was not in the part of the sky i would expect to see them. i could not hear any noise at all from the object which seemed to be at least 2 miles away. i kept watching waiting for the object to move but it stayed put. the longer i watched it, at this stage for 10 mins i was very surprised as it seemed to be pulsating and not anything i had seen before.

out of interest and knowing it would afford me a better view of the object i went looking for my hd video camera which has a decent zoom function. i found it easily as my eldest child had been using it a few weeks back. unfortunately the battery had been drained. i went looking for a charging cable and found it, all the while certain the object would be gone. by the time i found the power cable and connected it to the camera, i would say 10mins had elapsed. 

to my surprise the object was still there but it had moved slightly west. i used an extension cable which i plugged into a nearby power socket and that started giving some power to the camera. frustratingly as i tried to zoom in on the object the camera kept dying, i think due to lack of power. i left it a few mins to charge and tried again.

thankfully the cable power had sufficiently brought the camera back to life and i was able to zoom in on the object. i was shocked at the clarity of the image i saw. i was using a panasonic hc-v720, 20.4 megapixel, 28mm wide, x50 i.Zoom camera. i purchased it last year to take footage of a surf trip i made to the maldives. 

i started recording standing in the doorway of the yard door and took several minutes of footage. you can hear my wife in the background telling me to stop filming and come to bed. knowing i was seeing something unusual i kept filming before i had to adjust my position. the object was clearly moving into and out of sharp focus which suggested to me it was maintaining altitude but moving directly north and south.

i took the extension cable out into the yard in my bare feet as i did not want to risk going in to put boots on for fear of missing the object. by this time it had moved west but at the same altitude. i started filming again and got another 6 mins of footage. i panned out twice i think to show the building next to mine and a nearby street light to try and give some perspective on distance and size of the object. to me it looked very large given the distance from me to it. 

i eventually got really cold as it was not much above freezing. i stopped filming and went to bed. i woke at 6am when it was still dark and went into the yard again but could not see the object. in hindsight i should have put some warm clothes on and continued filming.

having watched the footage i took i can clearly see a distinct outline to the object which has a domed top, bulges in the middle and a dome below. it also very clearly has pulsating colours and lights at both its core and its outline. as a child i was a keen attender of air shows and since then see lots of aircraft in my area as it has a flight path to my nearest civilian airport. i am familiar with what civilian aircraft and military aircraft look like. this was not like anything i know of and made no noise. this shape and the objects behaviour puts it outside of any aircraft i am aware of and i would very much like to know if i was filming as star, planet, low earth orbit satellite etc. the more i watch the footage the more intrigued i am.
content.summary: Unusual light in night sky observed for over an hour and with 11mins of good quality hd cam footage.

content.detailedDescription: In my life time this was second sighting the first was about 400 yards away.But the first baffled me because although it seemed as though it was in the far united states, it took off the same way it landed with the same ball of fire but a long tail.
content.summary: Came in as shooting star. later shot up in same direction

content.detailedDescription: It was jan. 10, 2015 about 6:15pm. i set my telescope up to look for the comet lovejoy, i was looking at the star betelgeuse by orion's belt, then it happened a flying object came right in front of the star it was like slow motion it looked something like a ship from star wars (millenium falcon), it was all black with dim amber lights, it turned slightly and stayed in my view for about 45 seconds.  my telescope is 60x i had it set to the highest setting.  i am still in shock at what i saw. something was flying it.  i have seen shooting stars, satellites, airplanes, but nothing matches this, it was out of our solar system.
content.summary: I was looking through my telescope at betelgeuse by orion, it flew right into view, i saw it clearly, all black and amber lights, it was like slow motion watching it.

content.detailedDescription: Walking  dogs on side walk at  830pm noticed  bright  light  to the  west of  me... watched  it  for  10 mins  while  walking  dogs . took dogs  inside and  went out again with bincolars to look again. object  was stationary  for  5  mins  or  so while  i stood  there then left  to west at high rate of  speed.
content.summary: Possible triangle with blue  lights on  bottom white  lights  on  side..

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of jan 10, 2015 my friend and i were sitting in my back yard gazing up at the stars.  the evening was quite cool and clear with some light wispy clouds at high altitude.  we were sitting quietly when my friend told me to focus on the area just west of orion's star mintaka.  within a few minutes a translucent type of cloud appeared just southwest of the southern star of orion's belt alnitak.  a moment later a craft appeared "very clearly to me" as a crescent shaped remarkably beautiful ship/craft (sketches attached).  my friend and i both observed the craft at about 60 degrees above the horizon move silently across the sky from east to west.  the total time of viewing was about 8 to 10 seconds, at an approximate 60 deg field from start to finish.  
the backyard viewing location is a cement slab with no trees to obscure our view.  orion's belt was clearly in view and we had been outside in the dark for over a half an hour so our eyes were well adjusted to the night.  
there were no acquisition lights on the craft, which is very odd since the flight path was due west toward the lakeland airport.  with the sighted craft approximately 500 to 1000 feet in altitude, this is quite dangerous as there might be other small aircraft at that altitude with a potential collision issue.  if this was a military craft it would have had some type of lights on it or if super secret it would not have flown this path.
it appeared to me that the craft was illuminated from the urban city lights below therefore it must have been a shiny.  when the craft first appeared it was almost a translucent look, silver in color, but changed to a pale rose color before it disappeared.  the craft had a clearly defined shape and i could see some details on the underside.
content.summary: Crescent shaped craft appeared near orion's belt, moved from east to west.

content.detailedDescription:
On this particular evening i was driving home from work.  because of where i live, i always take gulph rd through valley forge park to and from work. i was driving nw on gulph rd towards phoenixville away from king of prussia, when i noticed three very bright lights just over the tree line in the distance (i think i noticed them just about the time i passed the washington memorial chapel). the lights were side by side. at first glance it looked to be an airplane of some sort. but as i drove closer i realized whatever it was, was too bright and too low to be a plane. i actually started to think that maybe they had built a tower in the park with lights at the top of it, but i knew that wasn’t logical because i would have seen this tower/monument by now. i also started to realize that whatever it was, wasn’t stationary. it was moving, but slowly. when i was finally back on a straight part of the road, i had decided that this was just too weird and started snapping pictures. as i got closer it was more apparent to me that this wasn’t a plane or a helicopter. i considered pulling over, but had someone behind me. it was also very dark and 17 degrees outside. but after my car had finally passed the lights (i couldn’t describe anything beyond that because of how bright the three lights were) i decided to look back at it out my driver side window. this is when i realized that it was literally just above the tree line and shaped like a triangle. once i was past the lights i could distinguish the shape vividly. 
after my experience i was a little shaken up. i called my mom, who thought i was just pulling her leg. but after i sent her the pictures, she was convinced. she even went as far as to research sightings in valley forge. she came up with two interesting stories. one, was of george washington, who had reported witnessing a ufo in the now park. and a few years ago someone else had reported a very similar story to mine, which made me feel less crazy.  
i have been living in the area for almost 5 years now, and i visit the park often. i know this park in and out. i know what the planes flying overhead look like. and i’ve seen my fair share of helicopters and drones. this to me was just so weird and unexplainable. it took me almost a week to even send in my story. i’m open-minded about unexplainable events, but i personally do not come to conclusions without thinking about it first. even if this was totally explainable, it was still weird and definitely a story worth sharing.
content.summary: Brightly lit, triangular shapped object hovering over trees in valley forge park.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on my balcony today 1/12/15 in the san fernando valley just before 1pm, i noticed two bright blue/white orbs descending from the sky from the north heading south in my direction. visibility was clear with some slight high altitude wispy clouds and slight haze.

initially, these glittering orbs seemed clustered and then one on top of the other as they continued to descend. they changed color from white to blue. several others white orbs then either appeared in the distant sky above these, or i just noticed them, but counted at least three more stationary orbs. 

there seemed to be some pulsating and gyrations going on in the closer objects. they then separated turning east and over the building causing me to exit through the front to get a better view as they were moving right over the central san fernando valley. i watched as these to objects positioned themselves adjacent to each other in a stationary formation with another stationary orb high above.

i watched these closer two remain stationary in a bright blue color and hover for about another ten minutes when the southernmost blue object began to slowly ascend where it became obscured in very high wispy clouds.

the other object remained stationary for several minutes when it's color darkened to a dark lead gray. a round or typical saucer shape was detectable, although had i had a pair of binoculars available i'm certain that i could have been able to see details the view was so good.

this lone remaining lead colored disc shaped objects made slow maneuvered starts and stops heading north. it lingered long enough for me to see it catch some possible sunlight as it did seem to reflect a little before ascending into a cloud.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright reflective orb light show over san fernando valley

content.detailedDescription: It took my cousin and mad her everl and she said it was faboulse and fantasitic.
